mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MEMBER VALUES (SEQ_MEMBER_NO.NEXTVAL, #{memberEmail}, #{memberPw}, #{memberNickname}, #{memberTel}, #{memberAddress}, NULL, DEFAULT, DEFAULT, DEFAULT )
mapper.select: SELECT MEMBER_NO, MEMBER_EMAIL, MEMBER_NICKNAME, MEMBER_PW, MEMBER_TEL, MEMBER_ADDRESS, PROFILE_IMG, AUTHORITY, TO_CHAR(ENROLL_DATE, 'YYYY "년" MM"월" DD"일" HH24 "시" MI "분" SS"초"') ENROLL_DATE FROM MEMBER WHERE MEMBER_EMAIL = #{memberEmail} AND MEMBER_DEL_FL = 'N'
